html:
12.13.20  8:24 pm   It's always been easy for me to write music, and I definitely have that infinity problem, but turning the music into a shareable product has always been less motivating. What's the best reason to record and share the art you make? 

      someone might hear it

12.13.20  7:30 pm   when you bought your large ukulele did you go to the store intending to buy a large ukulele?

      yes

12.13.20  7:21 pm   What are you studying

     workflows, production procedures, etc

     or from where did you get this interest about history of the world?

     being in the world eventually made me curious about its history

12.13.20  6:34 pm   whats your favorite song?

      i haven't found it yet, that's why i keep making new ones just in case

12.13.20  6:12 pm   What are garden gnomes?

      i'm still trying to figure out what a garden is

12.13.20  5:28 pm   what's the difference between being dumb, and idiot, and stupid

      perhaps the the day of the week

12.13.20  5:02 pm   what is the darn thing in your unboxing video?

      a description of the box

12.13.20  4:29 pm   To learn piano do you just press the buttons at when you think is the right time and then listen and fix until you press them at the right time more often?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.13.20  3:53 pm   I've been trying to show everyone that they're all neighbors but they mostly don't listen. How do I convince someone to care about other people?

      you might have to resort to various types of hypnosis, such as art and/or music

12.13.20  3:46 pm   Bill I have a problem, since I first heard your songs I can't hear any song from other people

      i went through a similar phase with someone else when i was younger. then i transitioned away from a strategy of listening to 1 artist to listening to literally every other artist. which was ideally meant to be a stepping stone toward one day myself becoming the artist, which is perhaps what i really wanted all along

12.13.20  3:21 pm   is christmas real yet?

      yes, despite its best efforts to be fake

12.13.20  1:51 pm   sometimes i hate music terminology so i just make up my own terms. for example: "dissecting" a chord: playing all notes of a common chord in succesion, backwards or forwards, or all around. Will you try to stop me? I thought so.

      news flash................. all terms are made up

12.13.20  12:38 pm   How do you find the subject matter for the lyrics of your songs? Do you just look at random things and make a song out of it, or is that just how your brain works?

      anything can be songs. so it's good to try many different things. It would be really nice to get to the most important things, but unfortunately this has a mind of its own and can't be forced. however, science tells us that all roads lead there so that's again why it's important to try many different things

12.13.20  12:14 pm   what do you think about nepotism?

      never heard of it

12.13.20  12:12 pm   How is the new song/video going

      pretty good

12.13.20  11:53 am   you've been answering questions since 2016-06, you are INSANE.

      2015

12.13.20  10:48 am   how is your work coming along

      pretty good

12.13.20  9:52 am   What are you working on right now?

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

12.13.20  9:30 am   You said you have this problem where your brain lacks an infinity warning...how did you overcome this problem in the past and how will you deal with it now?

      as it turns out, there is also no infinity warning on my desire to overcome this issue

12.13.20  8:21 am   how come in back to black album by amy winehouse does the studio have to do so much work on her voice? there is random pitch-correction and it is shocking to hear something so famous that has such a glaring duct tape job. is the world iMpErFeCt?????

      actually nowadays pitch correction is used much much more, but that album was made in 2006 when pitch correction technology was much worse

12.13.20  6:38 am   does the iv minor chord have a place in thisworld?

      hold on while i figure out whether that's 4 or 6, i am terrible with roman numbers............. Yes, it has a place in at least 30% of all songs, although the opportunity may not always be exercised, due to mismanagement/bureaucracy, etc

12.13.20  4:49 am   ever thought about suing yourself?

      every day bro

12.13.20  1:28 am   did this (https://billwurtz.com/note200508111639.html) inspire this (https://billwurtz.com/find-out-how-it-always-was.mp4)

      yes

12.13.20  1:25 am   I've been in kind of a rut musically and I find so many things I just can't seem to finish. I get discouraged by comparing it to the music I love and feel it can never be as good as I want it to be. Any advice for powering through this kind of rut?

      no, but i already know you're going to be fine

12.13.20  1:07 am   How do you balance accepting your faults and not hating yourself for having them but also recognizing that they really are faults and you'd be a better person to yourself and others if you fixed them?

      have you considered becoming a writer

12.12.20  11:54 pm   Are you working on a big project?

      i am working on the ability to make projects (which would be potentially a big ability), while also working on the first project, which happens to be of average size. while still working on the ability to do average sized projects at a more average to quick pace, which, if true, would be a very big ability for me

12.12.20  11:51 pm   Advise for someone just starting to write music?

      how did your first attempt go? if you have not done your first attempt then you should do that before asking how it's going to go

12.12.20  10:59 pm   What is the meaning of triangles?

      POLYGON: ACHIEVED!

12.12.20  10:55 pm   Is it ok to like music while knowing absolutely nothing about it.

      yes.... at least i hope it's ok. No one knows anything about music. ....and yet it seems to know everything about us

12.12.20  10:43 pm   Why does the key chord Bb make a good sad song?

      because of the way your instrument was built

12.12.20  9:32 pm   'maybe i could eat blades of grass' seems to have this weirdly defeated tone in comparison to your other stuff. the intro sets up a questioning vibe, and the question turns out to be 'why is everything so dumb and stupid'; and after some excursions and attempts at looking at some things in the real world, all of which we've actually done, it seems like we come to actually admit that the hypothesis is true: everything is stupid. (which is interesting, because that's technically not the question that was asked; that's a reaffirmation of what the question presumed to be true already in its phrasing, that everything was stupid. but it also might be an answer to the question anyway, in the stupidest possible way: everything is stupid because it's stupid. that's a pretty stupid answer, which seems about right.) the 'rock in a plaid shirt' part seems to be a kind of last-ditch effort at something that isn't stupid, something new, but it all goes w rong, an d it sounds like (with the falling pitches and the final kick drum hit on 'stupid') that the end of blades of grass really was meant to be an admission of defeat.

i just thought this was odd considering that you seem to be a fan of stupid; the two 'stupid songs' you've made seem to suggest you think stupidity can get you to stronger songs, videos, etc. but in blades of grass it seems like stupidity stands for a lack of meaning, and there's no way you're trying to say that nothing means anything - that's like the ultimate anti-bill wurtz sentiment as far as i can tell. let me know if any of this seems comprehensible to you. thanks

      after discussing with my therapist, i think i can see exactly what is happening here. This is the 3rd one of these, and i think what is becoming painfully clear at the time of writing (or perhaps soon after) is perhaps it's time to try writing something with multiple characters

12.12.20  7:11 pm   could ya yell me the meaning(s) of and the day goes on?

      it's a song. songs are supposed to mean everything. at least science tells us that this is possible

12.12.20  5:54 pm   What is time?

     it's you

      Why is time?

     it allows for different things to happen, instead of everything at once which feels like nothing

12.12.20  4:29 pm   hi bill, how are you today? I hope your new MV will be finished perfectly in time

     it was not, it's already at least 2 months late. Which is actually at least 20 months later than it should have been

     I'm just curious, are you going to use a new equipment in the future such as better quality camera, drum set, or new green screen other than new software editing that you use it right now?

     yes, there are many new improvements taking place now and in the future as well, some of which are similar and different from the ones you mentioned

12.12.20  4:20 pm   You'r first word on youtube was "die" and in the latest video "might quit" the last word is "everyone"... is this some sort of a.. coincedence?

      no. i love words

12.12.20  4:17 pm   its snowing here, any thoughts?

      you might be in.................................... michigan

12.12.20  4:13 pm   Whats your favorite cartoon?

      the i ching sequence

12.12.20  3:46 pm   Thoughts on fiction vs nonfiction?

      it's a competition to see which is more fake

12.12.20  2:50 pm   Do you have any advice on getting through periods of low artistic motivation? Thanks

      how about doing some SCIENCE

12.12.20  1:56 pm   describe the creative process

      ok

12.12.20  1:31 pm   isn't russet a weird word?

      yes

12.12.20  12:01 pm   how can i be free

      make a plan and then change the plan, OR, take a changed plan and keep it the same

12.12.20  11:07 am   how to write an essay about video games and its benefits?

      first step is to figure out what those benefits are. then after that it's pretty simple, just write them down

12.12.20  10:36 am   Is the airport terminal still open

     sort of

     because I think Mt St Helens is going to blow up and its giving me tomato anxiety

      fair enough

12.12.20  10:33 am   "the entire history of bill wurtz", when is it gonna be released?

      gradually, over time

12.12.20  10:16 am   Do you have shift button on your keyboard?

     2 per keyboard

      Or you don't want to use it?

     i use them all, hundreds of times a day

      Or you have a debate with your keyboard about it?

      no, shift is one of the most commonly used keys

12.12.20  9:48 am   Hey how are you doing?

      ok

12.12.20  9:30 am   are friends real?

      everyone is friends

12.12.20  8:43 am   can i find the chords for your song might quit on guitar?

      sure. try putting the capo on fret 2, to get into a key that might be more friendly for the guitar

12.12.20  7:14 am   how to write a poem

      how about placing 1 word in the direct center of the page
